title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the OilSpillCleanupRobot project, including functional requirements (e.g., navigation, oil detection, collection mechanisms), non-functional requirements (e.g., autonomy, durability, safety, scalability, maintainability, energy efficiency), constraints (e.g., regulations, environmental factors, operational conditions), and success criteria (e.g., cleanup efficiency, cost-effectiveness, reliability, adaptability). The defined scope and requirements should be detailed enough to guide the design, development, testing, and implementation phases of the project. Also, consider the potential for future upgrades or modifications.

title: Design System Architecture for OilSpillCleanupRobot
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software modules, communication protocols, and integration points. Ensure the design adheres to the following aspects: 1) Modular design for easy maintenance and upgrades, 2) Scalability to handle varying spill sizes, 3) Robust error handling and fault tolerance, 4) Real-time monitoring and reporting capabilities, 5) Integration with external systems (e.g., mapping, weather data), 6) Security measures to prevent unauthorized access or tampering, 7) Energy efficiency to maximize operational time, 8) Consider the impact of marine life during design and operation.

title: Develop Robot Hardware
description: Design and manufacture the physical robot components, including the chassis, motors, sensors, and other hardware components.

title: Develop Control Software
description: Develop the software for controlling the robot's movement, navigation, and oil cleanup operations.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for monitoring and controlling the robot remotely.

title: Implement Data Storage and Analytics
description: Design and implement a data storage solution for storing sensor data, mission logs, and other relevant data, and develop analytics tools for data analysis and reporting.

title: Establish Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive testing strategies, including unit testing, integration testing, and system testing, to validate the robot's functionality, reliability, and performance. This will include test cases for various scenarios and edge cases, as well as stress tests to ensure the robot can handle extreme conditions.

title: Implement Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the robot's software and communication systems are secure and compliant with relevant regulations and industry standards.

title: Comprehensive Deployment and Maintenance Plan for OilSpillCleanupRobot
description: Craft a thorough deployment strategy for the autonomous OilSpillCleanupRobot in real-world oil spill scenarios, incorporating logistics for transportation, on-site setup procedures, and regular maintenance routines to maximize performance and lifespan. Emphasis on robustness, scalability, and safety.

title: Create Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and training materials for end-users, maintenance personnel, and other stakeholders.
